channel.title: Desert Bus For Hope '10
channel.description:
For anyone who cares but wasn't aware, Desert Bus For Hope has started up again this weekend!
For those of you who don't know what this is, the crew from a popular Canadian comedy skit group from the web known as LoadingReadyRun (LRR) take donations for the Child's Play charity while playing possibly the most boring game ever created "Desert Bus". (Explained a little more on the auction page linked below).
Main Page: [url]https://desertbus.org/[/url]
Driver Cam: [url]https://desertbus.org/popups/live-feed-drivercam/[/url] Bus Cam: [url]https://desertbus.org/popups/live-feed-buscam/[/url] Chat: [url]https://desertbus.org/popups/live-chat/[/url] Auction Page: [url]https://desertbus.org/2010/11/18/welcome-to-desert-bus-for-hope-2010/[/url]

item.title: Desert Bus For Hope '10

item.description:
For anyone who cares but wasn’t aware, Desert Bus For Hope has started up again this weekend!

For those of you who don’t know what this is, the crew from a popular Canadian comedy skit group from the web known as LoadingReadyRun (LRR) take donations for the Child’s Play charity while playing possibly the most boring game ever created “Desert Bus”.
